name: El Puchero
address: Perif. Carlos Pellicer Cámara 614, Tulipanes, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico, 86097

reviews.text: Wow! Great local Mexican food. The things I would do for some of that mole right now.
The service was very slow and they demanded a tip.  However, the food was worth the wait.

name: El Teapaneco
address: Calle Quintín Arauz Carrillo 214, Primero de Mayo, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico, 86190

reviews.text: Best tacos in Tabasco.  And the staff were so considerate of our complete lack of Spanish.
Yikes! We were given uncooked meat.  My daughter was sick for three days.  At least when we went back to complain they gave us a refund, otherwise just one star. Be careful if you eat here.
Overall I would recommend this place.  Allot of expats here though gave this place an inauthentic vibe, but regardless the tacos were great.

name: KFC
address: Heroico Colegio Militar 103, Atasta de Serra, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico, 86100

reviews.text: The pollo was not fully cooked in one part, but the rest was delicious.  Beware of your food not being fully cooked.
With so many great food options in Villa Hermosa, sometimes some good old KFC is the way to go.  Good price, great service, and tasty food with a healthy portion.

name: Fuego Extremo
address: Calle Andrés García 219, Primero de Mayo, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico, 86190

reviews.text: The burgers were overpriced but worth it given their freshness and taste.
The burger was super tasty with so many obviously fresh ingredients.  It was nice to sit out on the street and people watch. Unfortunately, the service was a little slow.

name: Merihnos Restaurante
address: Calle Andrés García 239, Primero de Mayo, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico, 86190

reviews.text: I asked for milk and sugar with my coffee, and recieved neither.  The coffee took twenty minutes, and then they tried to charge me for the milk and sugar.  Go somewhere else.
They had great draft beer, something of a rarity in Mexico.  I intend on bringing my friends back tonight for a good pre-drink before hitting up the clubs.
The service was poor, and everything was overpiced compared to other places.  I should have gone for my lunch elsewhere.
The atmosphere was great.  Great live music all day long.  Also a great place to get some work done as they have great wifi!

name: Jochos Jarochos Sandino
address: Av. Gral. Augusto César Sandino 330, Primero de Mayo, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico, 86190

reviews.text: Best coffee in town.  The coffee is free trade and local to the area. The coffee shop is a little out of the way to access, but once you there you will enjoy the coffee.
Great vibe in this coffee shop.  Nice music and decour with coffee to suit the mood perfectly.

name: Bar Deja Vu
address: Calle Quintín Arauz Carrillo 105, Primero de Mayo, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico, 86190

reviews.text: The burgers are too expensive for the portion size.  I felt like I could have had a second portion.  But the burger itself is tasty.
I had a greek salad. The cheese was local cheese instead of greek cheese, and the local cheese was even better in the salad then greek cheese. And I'm someone from Greece saying this.
Terrible service. Terrible burger. Terrible place. DO NOT GO HERE!!!

name: Plaza Jaguar
address: Av Paseo de la Sierra 609, Reforma, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico, 86090

reviews.text: This place is great for those needing some time on a computer.  The prices are reasonable, the wifi good, and there are many places to sit with power outlets. Also, the lighting is great.  Good Pizza too.
